response.overview: Legendary marshal Wyatt Earp, now a weary gunfighter, joins his brothers Morgan and Virgil to pursue their collective fortune in the thriving mining town of Tombstone. But Earp is forced to don a badge again and get help from his notorious pal Doc Holliday when a gang of renegade brigands and rustlers begins terrorizing the town.
response.tagline: Every town has a story. Tombstone has a legend.
response.title: Tombstone

titles.title: Tombstone: La leyenda de Wyatt Earp
